text: George Pratt Shultz (December 13, 1920 â€“ February 6, 2021) was an American politician, economist, statesman, and businessman. He served as the United States Secretary of Labor from 1969 to 1970, as the U.S. Secretary of the Treasury from 1972 to 1974, and as the U.S. Secretary of State from 1982 to 1989. Shultz was born on December 13, 1920 in New York City, New York Gale Biography In Context. and studied at Princeton University and at Massachusetts Institute of Technology. He has been married to Helena O'Brien from 1946 until her death in 1995. He married Charlotte Mailliard in 1997. Shultz has five children. He and Henry Kissinger were the last surviving members of Nixon's cabinet.
